website_summaries.verdict: It sports some attractive features, but others we considered are more reliable.
pros: Rivals pricier models with its superb music/radio capabilities and precise connectivity
Lightweight, streamlined design and vivid display
cons: Doesn't have a built-in speaker but easily connects to your favorite external speakers for the sound you want

customer_reviews.title: The Ocean Digital tuner is an excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace a Grace Digital tuner that failed after only 29 months. My wife found the Ocean Digital Tuner so much easier to to configure than the Grace Tuner. The Ocean Digital tuner is an excellent value for the money, and adding the extended warranty for 4 years is well worth the investment. Living in a rural area this tuner allows us to listen to some of the best Classical Music stations. Waking up to Classical music sure beats the old buzzer alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond H. Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Decent little wifi radio Receiver.
customer_reviews.text: Device works well. Info was not clear that amplified speakers were needed with this radio, so make sure to get speakers when you order the device so you can use it when it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck H.

customer_reviews.title: No more static!!!
customer_reviews.text: It got to the point where every station had static inside our metal building, even with an external antenna... this thing brings in crystal clear stations from all over the world! Very easy to set up and connect to our wifi, most of the "stations" have very good sound quality... the few that don't must be due to the low quality broadcast, not this device. --------Update---------- A little over a year later, radio is still working great! We found that we had to set a "permanent" ip address reservation on our wifi router for this device so that it would stay connected day-after-day... but now all is well!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item and immediately attempted to set it up. It connected to my wifi, but I was unable to connect to the various internet radio stations that I had tried. And likewise, it would not tune in any of the local stations that I tried. I immediately packed it up and initiated a return request with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Martin L

customer_reviews.title: Lots of features and Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This a great little internet radio. It does take a little internet knowledge to get it setup and get some stations you like. I love the led display with weather and the time. The display is small and hard to see from across the room, but I am using it in my office and it works great. For those who don't know, this device needs to plug into powered amplified speakers or a stereo system (which is how I use it).
customer_reviews.author: sailor

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd internet tuner and the difference between this and my first one is like night and day. Both are from Chinese manufactures, have similar features, and sell for around $65. The first was difficult to understand, set up, and operate. This one is the opposite. Both can only be operated by the supplied remote controls. The first one's was small, flimsy, and soon started to fail. The new one's is much more robust. So far I am totally satisfied with the Ocean Digital.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: For background music and talk shows it's OK
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for true HiFi keep looking.The sound is somewhat muffled, music lacks sparkle. For talk shows, and background music it's fine. Using the headphone output instead of the line ou lets you play with the built in "equalizer" to get a better sound.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Enough abilty to store many Favorite Stations.
customer_reviews.text: The unit has got a big difficulty in connecting the Network when you Turn it on.Everytime you turn it OFF and ON you will have to wait for a long time to connect and hear the music. I use simillar devices which directly connects and is able to play music. You need to be patient to hearthe music. Otheer parts are acceptable, the list of the favorites etc. Enough abilty to store many Favorite Stations.
customer_reviews.author: Metin Munzur

customer_reviews.title: This "radio" realy is perfect for where I live.
customer_reviews.text: Where I am: No AM nor FM reception at all (just 2 stations am, at very intermittent and low quality).It's nice I now have this unit. Previously used cell phones, but they are not build to last when "ON", all the time/all day, basically. (I've had battery failures and screen failures, mainly from overheating. ) This dedicated little interface (no bells and whistles; just functionality) is likely to last me a long time. Complete "internet radios" are an option, but then the sound quality is also 'compact'. Now I still have the fidelity of the stereo system (or the home theater system) already present. Great, so far. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: W v. T.

customer_reviews.title: I like Internet Radio
customer_reviews.text: Works great - I couldn't understand why someone would want a separate device to stream music, after all the phone or computer works. But since I got this, it's easy and nice to stream from a separate device when working on the computer without leaving a separate app running all the time.
customer_reviews.author: B. Groves

customer_reviews.title: Device was broken--returned it
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for the tuner because I have an Ocean internet table top radio I love. But this turner didn't work at all. Contacted Ocean and Amazon and described the problem. Amazon offered to take it back and refund my money. I returned.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little device
customer_reviews.text: It took a bit of work to program, but once done it's FANTASTIC !!! it locks into the stations with no delay or buffering. Plugs right into my kitchen counter speakers. It is small and nice looking. I am EXTREMELY HAPPY WITH THIS ITEM !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: No touch screen. No 5 Stars. Average device
customer_reviews.text: Nice small unit. The screen size is tiny and probably a little too small considering the size of the unit. This product could have been a 5 star product all round but some end user nice touches have been left off, specifically no touch screen, this feature would have made this unit better as well as some on screen controls like volume, brightness, even an on off button. Instead to control you need to use the remote, so in low light situations you will be left fumbling and pressing the wrong keys. Overall it's a little too cluncky but it does deliver what it promises to do.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Colbran

customer_reviews.title: It works well, just don't misplace or lose the ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well, just don't misplace or lose the remote, there are absolutely no controls on the radio itself, and without it you can't do anything. However, there is an upside to this, if you have a guest (close relative) in your house who likes to mess with things, you can hide the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Timm

customer_reviews.title: Great radio with neat features.
customer_reviews.text: I have two internet radio adapters. Both work very well. The Ocean Digital is a bit more completed to set up than the Myine Radio. The Ocean Digital has a number of features such as a clock, a snooz feature and an alarm feature that are neat. Not sure I will ever use some of those features. I gave the radio a 4 star rating instead of a 5 star rating simply because I have not as yet learned how to use all the features. The radio also has an EQ feature that looks interesting. The sound through my Bose radio is great. The package was shipped from China and arrived in less than the original projected date.
customer_reviews.author: James Griffith

customer_reviews.title: does what it's meant to and tells the weather. ...
customer_reviews.text: does what it's meant to and tells the weather. no onboard speaker, but has headphone jack and audio out jack.
customer_reviews.author: B. Racz

customer_reviews.title: I like the radio itself
customer_reviews.text: I like the radio itself. The user interface, however, is a nightmare thanks to the amateurish UMedia website. Had I to it over again, I would have purchased a more versatile, easier to use and less expensive Amazon Echo Dot.
customer_reviews.author: John Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Works good, but medium quality audio from both the fixed ...
customer_reviews.text: Works good, but medium quality audio from both the fixed line out and variable headphone out. When playing back the same stream with the laptop and doing an A-B comparison with the Ocean Digital using my home audio system, one will notice an audio frequency roll off starting around 12 KHz. This unit is to be used in a lab with much fan noise so this is not a problem for me, but for serious listening I would choose something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: initially it was quite happy with it
customer_reviews.text: i bought it a month ago as a gift for my girlfriend, initially it was quite happy with it, it was a great device for what it was, even if it has a cheap plastic build. Now with in one month- first the remote volume stopped working, now it switches of randomly... and yes i have made sure it is not on timer..invest on a better product from a more reputed company... i am utterly disgusted.
customer_reviews.author: rajsekhar aich

customer_reviews.title: This a great product. It is easy to setup and use
customer_reviews.text: This a great product. It is easy to setup and use. Their Customer support is excellent. When I could not locate a internet radio station with a search, they updated the software and added it for me. They are very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: ABV

customer_reviews.title: Suits my needs just fine
customer_reviews.text: Tuner does what it is supposed to and am very satisfied for night time listening. I get very poor reception at home. I used an old, cheap pair of 2" laptop speakers powered by usb with a simple usb charger.and plugged them into the headphone jack instead of the audio out jack. Volume can then be controlled by the remote and is just about at the right level on the nightstand. More radio than I want or need as I have no use for bluetooth, UPnP or DLNA. Also the display dimmer set at minimum does not interfere with sleep. I find nothing wrong with it for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: RJB

customer_reviews.title: Sound is not bad.
customer_reviews.text: It's very useful the app's control and the Bluetooth function when we have an internet outage. I hope it will have a long term online support.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Suazo M.

customer_reviews.title: stoped working
customer_reviews.text: I connected it to an amplifier to listen to internet radio stations It worked fine at first. But suddenly it stopped. It did connect to the wifi , and locked on the desired station. But no audio came out, only the hiss of the electricity source. Great disappointment !
customer_reviews.author: Adam Rom

customer_reviews.title: Every other device in our house does just fine.
customer_reviews.text: won't connect to our router. Every other device in our house does just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. John Egan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for its price
customer_reviews.text: This Ocean Digital internet, so far, works very well. It was easier to program than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: AAC

customer_reviews.title: Very good product if you follow manual.
customer_reviews.text: Works great provides the music I wanted at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: don

customer_reviews.title: Poor network connectivity, dropping connection frequently.
customer_reviews.text: Drops network connection way too frequently. I had an old Grace Digital internet radio tuner sitting in the exact same location, and while that one had its own severe problems, at least it didn't have to be restarted every 20 minutes. I also find the sound quality abysmal compared to the older tuner I had.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gamon

customer_reviews.title: Internet radio
customer_reviews.text: I had no trouble setting up did not even look at instructions. Very intuitive. Battery for remote would have been nice. Great performance. Had it playing in five minutes
customer_reviews.author: trk drvr

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: trying to learn how to use it. not many radio station would hook up
customer_reviews.author: Trash Can

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Endless radio stations to listen too. Well worth the money spent. Easy to use, just plug it in to your home stereo,
customer_reviews.author: Gordy Silver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use it as a clock radio and it works fine
customer_reviews.author: tvchuckles

customer_reviews.title: Endless listening possibilities
customer_reviews.text: It certainly delivers as advertised and it picks up radio stations across the world. The wi-fi link to my laptop works well. I have pretty good speakers and amp and the sound quality could be a bit sharper and less muffled.
customer_reviews.author: Rick C

customer_reviews.title: Good unit, not configured as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The unit I received came with only one audio output, not two as pictured. Otherwise I'm satisfied
customer_reviews.author: AllThumbs

customer_reviews.title: NO SPEAKERS!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing does not have speakers. Want to use for travel-do not want to pack speakers also.
customer_reviews.author: ladyfsgf

customer_reviews.title: Nice and usefull
customer_reviews.text: If you need an inexprnsive wifi tuner to connect to your amp, this is a good option.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Sivron

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Plugged it in and . . . nothing. Would not even turn on. I did get it at the promised time or maybe a day earlier. I am in the process of trying to return it.
customer_reviews.author: BobbyV

customer_reviews.title: Simple great product
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service, they found and added a station I was looking for. It does what it says on the tin. I use it for my business
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small, compact, and great
customer_reviews.text: I love classical music. Found "Radio Swiss Klaasic" and haven't needed anymore stations n
customer_reviews.author: MMM-1957

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous device - great price and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous device - great price and great quality. We love getting classical music channels from all over the world.
customer_reviews.author: turtle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy it works great. It was a lot smaller than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Saenz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looked like it was an "Display Item", but Amazon solved the issue. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Is there a better one?
customer_reviews.text: This device only get you a few stations.The volume is low even when you turn it up all the way.
customer_reviews.author: John Leroy

customer_reviews.title: Great internet radio, some minor issues.
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the radio a lot. It sounds good and is reliable when set up correctly. I would prefer the radio have some controls on its base to allow usage without the remote and the line out could have the option to drive at a slightly higher level. This is a requirement because some internet stations are modulated at a lower level than others. I also found it odd that since the remote is required for operation one would think they would include batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Edward N Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No comment yet this is my second one in about 8years never had problem. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: james jones

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible reception and sound. It sounds like a transister radio and could not pick up many stations.
customer_reviews.author: TMH

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only problem I've had is it drops satellite signal on occasion. Could be distance from router.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Truly plug and play. I'm ordering a second one ...
customer_reviews.text: Truly plug and play. I'm ordering a second one for home.
customer_reviews.author: Richard I Blum

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality was significantly worse with this devise
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped for this to take the place of my iPhone, which I connect to a pair of audioengine powered speakers in our living room. The sound quality was significantly worse with this devise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Still it has some really nice features at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: There are a few things that are a bit awkward in operating but some of it is learning more details and shortcuts perhaps. Still it has some really nice features at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike W.

customer_reviews.title: A Very Nice Tuner but...
customer_reviews.text: This Internet Radio Adapter is just what I was looking for. It's size is perfect for my audio system without being overwhelming and the performance is outstanding. My only complaint is the small 2.5" screen on a unit that screams out for, and will easily accommodate, a 5" screen. 2.5" is fine if you're using it on your desk but, for an audio system shelf, 5" is a must. I hope Ocean Digital will correct this in the future.
customer_reviews.author: dvan@VAB

customer_reviews.title: Good little radio
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat little radio. Setting it up was easy after getting used to the remote control. It will store 250 presets but I'll never use that many. It replaced a more expensive one that quit. I like it and recommend it to anyone wanting a wireless internet radio.
customer_reviews.author: Sport98

customer_reviews.title: It is the worst radio I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: It is the worst radio I ever bought. The instruction manual has a lot of the operations of the radio deleted. It is very hard to program, very difficult to add a station, looks like the radio was designed very poorly.
customer_reviews.author: Elias Strubel

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this receiver unless you only want to only listen ...
customer_reviews.text: My goal was to have an internet radio that I could use to listen to the old time radio shows. Unfortunately, there is no menu listing for this category and manually entering the URL's was unsuccessful (and extremely time consuming). I would not recommend this receiver unless you only want to only listen to music.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: All Internet Radios NOT the Same
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of posts about internet radios before buying and. I thought they were all the same. They are not. This radio looked like it was a return, it buffered all the time even though it was in the same room as the router AND you can NOT install apps like tunein
customer_reviews.author: Astroidor

product_meta.title: Ocean Digital Radio Tuner Model WR01C Spotify WiFi WLAN Internet Radio with Bluetooth Receiver, UPnP&DLNA, Audio Out Desktop Radio Airmusic Control APP- Black
feature_bullets: Wi-Fi internet radio, 26,000+ radio stations. 250 presets.
Bluetooth receiver- streaming music from other devices such as smart phone or tablet.
This tuner / receiver has NO BUILT-IN SPEAKER, 3.5mm audio out to connect external powered / active speaker.
Stream music via UPnP from PC or via DLNA from smart phone, tablet to the radio.
Features: Color LCD display,dual alarm clock and time keeper,weather and time dispaly,media U server,AirMusic Control APP.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars90 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
